src:
Grup Tofu Akan Reuni di The 90's Festival
06 Nov 2019, 17:38 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Kembali tampil di atas panggung dalam formasi empat personel di The 90's Festival, grup Tofu berjanji ada sejumlah penampilan yang berbeda. (CNN Indonesia/M Andika Putra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Untuk kali pertama, grup Tofu akan tampil dengan formasi reuni di festival musik The 90's Festival. Salah satu personel Tofu, Fla, mengatakan grup yang ia taungi akan tampil dengan empat personel."Kami berempat sudah bertemu dan sudah latihan. Semua berjalan dengan baik, paling lupa lirik saja," kata Fla saat jumpa media di kawasan Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11).Tofu sendiri dibentuk pada 1999 silam oleh Fla, Surya Utama (Uya) dan Anton Budinugroho. Dengan formasi ini mereka merilis dua album bertajuk Tofu (2001) dan Dua (2003).Pada 2003, Uya memutuskan untuk keluar dari Tofu, posisinya digantikan oleh Joeniar Arief. Dengan formasi ini, mereka merilis dua album bertajuk Dua (Neoformation) (2004) dan The Best of Tofu: Playlist (2006)."Setelah rilis album The Best itu kami berhenti total. Banyak yang tawarin dari lima tahun lalu, tapi kami belum siap dan belum toku [tua]," kata Fla sembari tertawa.Anton menambahkan, "Setelah itu kami enggak pernah reuni, ini pertama kali reuni. Nanti manggung berempat juga pertama kali setelah belasan tahun."Fla menjelaskan Arief saat ini tinggal di Semarang dan bekerja kantoran. Saat dihubungi dan diajak manggung, Arief menyatakan hanya bisa tampil di akhir pekan.Lebih lanjut, Fla yakin penampilan nanti tidak akan sulit karena Tofu juga mengajak pemain tambahan yang dulu main bersama mereka. Begitu pula dengan kru yang mengurus hal-hal teknis seperti road manager dan sound engineer."Kalau baru lagi susah, karena Tofo ada beberapa aransemen, ada yang rock ada yang bikin dance. Kalau mereka kan tinggal pemanasan saja," kata Fla.Selain mereka, masih ada band atau grup yang tampil dengan formasi reuni di The 90's Festival. Mereka adalah Tofu, Element, Wong, Dr. PM dan U'camp.Ada pula musisi internasionalÂ seperti Hanson, Aqua, Vertical Horizon dan Michael Learn to Rock. Kemudian beberapa musisi nasional yang akan tampil adalah KLa Project, God Bless, Naif, Jamrud, Potret dan P-Project.Untuk kali pertama The 90's Festival akan diselenggarakan selama dua hari pada 23-24 November. Acara ini akan digelar di Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat.




(adp/end)
text:
Tofu Group Will Reunion at The 90's Festival
Nov 6 2019, 17:38 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Returning to the stage in a four-person formation at The 90's Festival, the Tofu group promised a number of different performances. (CNN Indonesia / M Andika Putra)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - For the first time, the Tofu group will perform with a reunion formation at the music festival The 90's Festival. One of Tofu's personnel, Fla, said the group he was attending would perform with four personnel. "The four of us have met and have been training. All went well, most forgot the lyrics," Fla said during a media conference in the Central Jakarta area, Wednesday (Wednesday) 6/11). Tofu itself was formed in 1999 by Fla, Surya Utama (Uya) and Anton Budinugroho. With this formation they released two albums titled Tofu (2001) and Dua (2003). In 2003, Uya decided to get out of Tofu, his position was replaced by Joeniar Arief. With this formation, they released two albums titled Two (Neoformation) (2004) and The Best of Tofu: Playlist (2006). "After the release of The Best album, we stopped completely. Many offered from five years ago, but we were not ready yet. and not yet to me, "said Fla while laughing. Annton added," After that we never reunited, this is the first time a reunion. The four of them will also be performing for the first time after a dozen years. "Fla explained Arief currently lives in Semarang and works office When contacted and invited to a gig, Arief stated that he could only perform on weekends. Furthermore, Fla was sure that the performance would not be difficult because Tofu also invited additional players who used to play with them. Likewise with the crew who takes care of technical matters such as road managers and sound engineers. "If it's just hard again, because Tofo there are some arrangements, some rock people make dance. If they just stay warm," said Fla. , there are still bands or groups that perform with a reunion formation at The 90's Festival. They are Tofu, Element, Wong, Dr. PM and U'camp. There are also international musicians such as Hanson, Aqua, Vertical Horizon and Michael Learn to Rock. Then some national musicians who will perform are KLa Project, God Bless, Naif, Jamrud, Portrait and P-Project. For the first time The 90's Festival will be held for two days on November 23-24. This event will be held at Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Central Jakarta.




(adp / end)
